alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 1:29AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Flagler, southeastern St. Johns, southeastern Marion and southeastern Putnam Counties through 200 AM EDT... At 128 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Butler Beach to 6 miles north of Pierson to near Moss Bluff. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Saint Augustine, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Crescent City, Andalusia, Juniper Springs, Lynne, Saint Augustine Beach and Marineland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Marion
